analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nalokiyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na lokiyam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nalokuttaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na lokuttaram na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: (Gaṇitakena gaṇetabbā tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: gaṇitakena gaṇetabbā tīṇi pañhā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nalokiyaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanasappaṭigho ….
analyzed: na lokiyam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: (Tīṇiyeva pañhā kātabbā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe
analyzed: tīṇiyeva pañhā kātabbā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe

original: Nalokuttaraṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na lokuttaram na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
